string-array.name: kotlin_detail
string-array.item: Val is used for immutable variable Var is used for mutable variable
In kotlin readLine is used to get user input val name = readLine()
The basic types used in kotlin : number , booleans ,characters , string, and arrays.
In kotlin + sign is used to combine two strings and String interpolation allows to inject string variable into a string print("$greeting Amal and $name")
Kotlin does all the basic operations
Is used to execute multiple conditional statements
If is used to execute a conditional statement
Is used for error handling in kotlin
For loop is used to iterate through anything that provides an iterator
To create a random number, kotlin offer a Random class in the kotlin.random package
Works like for loop but we have to declare an iterator outside the loop
In kotlin function is declared using the key word fun
Arguments are passed to the function when it is invoked in the main function
